content.rendered:
Yes, after a two week holiday / schedule clash / general bad planning on my part, I’m back with This Week in Genesis #8 with new themes, a stunning showcase selection plus some big news from Sridhar Katakam.

Themes

The folks at ZigZagPress launch Dune, a new beautiful new Genesis theme.

Introducing Dune: a beautiful, feature-rich #GenesisWP theme for photobloggers http://t.co/YDlEfJ5N3Z

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) June 24, 2015

Sneaking back into last week, Scott Ellis launched a Local Media theme.

Buy @vsellis #genesiswp Local Media Child Theme theme at half price! Do it! http://t.co/rVIzRZFs9a #dfwwp pic.twitter.com/ufA6eBHuCB

— DFW WordPress Group (@dfwwp) June 18, 2015

Aakash Dodiya is giving away new Geneis child theme, Minim lite.

#genesiswp powered starter theme. Minim lite. Available free. http://t.co/oKGXI5ezCM #Wordpress pic.twitter.com/WZvHGTry8k

— Aakash Dodiya (@DevelopersQ) June 26, 2015

JT Grauke has a new real estate theme in the pipeline:

Working on a real estate theme for Genesis and Wovax @wovaxapp @studiopress #ui #ux #wordpress #genesiswp #realestate http://t.co/J9CrbbJzIf

— JT Grauke (@jtgrauke) June 19, 2015

And Brian Gardner teases us all…

Tonight … I just might start designing something for you all. #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) June 22, 2015

Showcase

Vaughan Simons launches this fantastic site for jamesmorgan.co.uk

We’ve just launched a new site for award-winning photojournalist and film director @jamesmorganfoto: http://t.co/wWtBdsoXBR – take a look…

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) June 22, 2015

OK, technically it was the work before but as I’ve missed a couple of weeks, I couldn’t leave out this great site by Lauren at Restored 316, vickicourtney.com

Just did a major update to @vicki_courtney site using our Darling theme and I'm completely in love! http://t.co/WXMfJjSQfQ #genesiswp

— Lauren (@restored316) June 18, 2015

Wes Cole launches marketoonist.com for a marketing cartoonist (of course).

Ryan Townley launches a new minimal site for powerfulyou.co

Launched a minimal #genesiswp site for my buddy and his new ebook "The Powerful You" http://t.co/5tPcuJTqda pic.twitter.com/O8aVHj0Wi5

— Ryan Townley (@ryantownley) June 24, 2015

News & Articles

As previously discussed here on GenesisWP.guide, Sridhar Katakam (he of that awesome Genesis code tutorial website fame), is increasing the price of his membership site from $10/month to $47/month. So if you’re not already a member, better go grab your membership now before the end of June (I did):

Membership Price Increase https://t.co/PZfjJtsrWc

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) June 20, 2015

That’s all for this week.

Got a comment on anything above? / Dig the Twitter cards? Don’t dig the Twitter cards?  / Just want to see your name in lights on this page?

Go ahead and comment below and feel your life and very being instantly improve.

excerpt.rendered: Yes, after a two week holiday / schedule clash / general bad planning on my part, I’m back with This Week in Genesis #8 with new themes, a stunning showcase selection plus some big news from Sridhar Katakam.
